00060 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00064 static kb_command_t cmds[] = {
00065   { "quit"            , 0 , 0 , quit } ,
00066   { "exit"            , 0 , 0 , quit } ,
00067   { "bye"             , 0 , 0 , quit } ,
00068   { "help"            , 0 , 0 , help } ,
00069   { NULL              , 0 , 0 , NULL }
00070 };
00071 
00072 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 int help( int argc , char * argv[] , void * data) 
00076 {
00077   kb_command_t * scan = cmds;
00078   while(scan->name != NULL)
00079   {
00080     printf("%s\r\n",scan->name);
00081     scan++;
00082   }
00083   return 0;
00084 }
00085 
00086 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00090 static char buf[1024];
00091 
00092 int main( int argc , char * argv[] )
00093 {
00094   int rc,ver,io,ad,pw = 0, freq;
00095   char newpage = 12, state;
00096   uint16_t val;
00097   uint32_t time;
00098   
00099 
00100   /* Set the libkorebot debug level - Highly recommended for development. */
00101   kb_set_debug_level(2);
00102 
00103   if((rc = kb_init( argc , argv )) < 0 )
00104     return 1;
00105 
00106   signal( SIGINT , ctrlc_handler );
00107 
00108   printf("K-Team KoreIO Test Program\r\n");
00109   
00110   koreio = knet_open( "KoreIOLE:Board", KNET_BUS_ANY, 0 , NULL );
00111   if(!koreio)
00112   {
00113     printf("Cannot open KoreIOLE device trying alternate address\r\n");
00114     koreio = knet_open( "KoreIOLE:AltBoard", KNET_BUS_ANY, 0 , NULL );
00115     if(!koreio)
00116     {
00117       printf("Cannot open KoreIOLE device\r\n");
00118       return 1;
00119     }
00120   }
00121 
00122   /* Get and display the koreio firmware version */
00123   kio_GetFWVersion(koreio,&ver);
00124 
00125   printf("KoreIOLE firmware %d.%d\r\n", (ver&0x000000F0)>>4, (ver&0x0000000F));
00126 
00127         /* config all the IO as a output */
00128   io = 0;
00129         while(io < 16)
00130         while(io < 16)
00131         {
00132           kio_ConfigIO(koreio,io,1);
00133           io++;
00134                 usleep(1000);
00135         }
00136         /* set one of two Output */
00137     io = 0;
00138         while(io < 16)
00139         {
00140           kio_SetIO(koreio,io);
00141           io+= 2;
00142         }       
00143           /* clear one of two Output */
00144     io = 1;
00145         while(io < 16)
00146         {
00147           kio_ClearIO(koreio,io);
00148           io+= 2;
00149         }       
00150         
00151         
00152   
00153   /* parse commands */
00154   while (!quitReq) {
00155     printf("\n> ");
00156           
00157 
00158  /* read all the analog input value */
00159   ad = 0;
00160   while(ad < 12)
00161   {     
00162         kio_ReadAnalog(koreio,ad,&val,&time);
00163         printf("read ad %d: %u at %lu mS\r\n",ad,val,time);       
00164         ad++;
00165   }
00166 
00167                 /* blink the output */
00168   io = 0;
00169         while(io < 16)
00170         {
00171           kio_ChangeIO(koreio,io);
00172           io++;
00173         }       
00174 
00175 
00176 
00177   /* blink the power output */
00178   kio_ClearPW(koreio,pw);
00179   if(++pw > 5)
00180           pw = 0;
00181   kio_SetPW(koreio,pw);
00182 
00183   
00184           
00185           
00186 
00187     /*if ( fgets( buf , sizeof(buf) , stdin ) != NULL ) {
00188       buf[strlen(buf)-1] = '\0';
00189       kb_parse_command( buf , cmds , NULL);
00190     }*/
00191   /* clear the current page */
00192       usleep(200000);
00193           printf("%c", newpage);
00194 
00195   }
00196 
00197   knet_close( koreio );
00198 }
